Description:
Detect use of the Windows 8.3 short name. Which could be used as a method to avoid Image based detection

Author: frack113, Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Use NTFS Short Name in Image
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%~1.bat%' or process_path like '%~1.dll%' or process_path like '%~1.exe%' or process_path like '%~1.hta%' or process_path like '%~1.js%' or process_path like '%~1.msi%' or process_path like '%~1.ps1%' or process_path like '%~1.tmp%' or process_path like '%~1.vbe%' or process_path like '%~1.vbs%' or process_path like '%~2.bat%' or process_path like '%~2.dll%' or process_path like '%~2.exe%' or process_path like '%~2.hta%' or process_path like '%~2.js%' or process_path like '%~2.msi%' or process_path like '%~2.ps1%' or process_path like '%~2.tmp%' or process_path like '%~2.vbe%' or process_path like '%~2.vbs%') and  not parent_process_path = 'c:\windows\explorer.exe' and  not (process_path = 'c:\progra~1\winzip\wzprel~1.exe' or process_path like '%\vcredi~1.exe' or parent_process_path like '%\webex\webexhost.exe' or parent_process_path like '%\thor\thor64.exe'))
